title: Conical Tank Draining
description: Interactive simulation showing how fast water level changes in a conical tank, demonstrating related rates and similar triangles relationship between tank dimensions and rate of water level change.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Related Rates
Derivatives
Applied Mathematics

controls.label: H (tank height)
controls.description: Adjust the total height of the conical tank

controls.label: R (tank radius)
controls.description: Adjust the radius at the top of the conical tank

controls.label: dV/dt (drain rate)
controls.description: Set the rate at which water drains from the tank

controls.label: Play/Pause
controls.description: Start or stop the draining animation

controls.label: Click tank
controls.description: Click on the tank visualization to set water level
